original_text: Then the heads of the fathers' houses of the Levites came to Eleazar the priest and to Joshua the son of Nun and to the heads of the fathers' houses of the tribes of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 그 때에 레위 사람의 족장들이 제사장 엘르아살과 눈의 아들 여호수아와 이스라엘 자손의 지파 족장들에게 나아와

sentences.original_text: Then the heads of the fathers' houses of the Levites came
and to Joshua the son of Nun
and to the heads of the fathers' houses of the tribes of the people of Israel.
